channel.title: Higher max level
channel.description: How can I make the max level higher for NON COMBAT skills, I know how to do it for all skills but not a certain set of skills (non combat)

item.title: Higher max level
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Briefly looking into this I stumbled upon

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
				* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp)
			return lvl;
	}
	return 99;
}[/code]

Do you have something like this?

Read full topic
